subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Dallas Mavericks could not have acquired Jason Kidd on Tuesday without Keith Van Horn’s participation as a trading chip sent to the Nets to balance salaries, per N.B.A. rules.
snippet: The Dallas Mavericks could not have acquired Jason Kidd on Tuesday without Keith Van Horn’s participation as a trading chip sent to the Nets to balance salaries, per N.B.A. rules.
